DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect 12 week daily supplementation Superba ( TM ) Krill Oil fast serum triglyceride level omega-3 index subject whose habitual fatty fish seafood intake low borderline high high fast serum triglyceride level .
DOC.brief_title: Study Investigate Effects Krill Oil Fasting Serum Triglycerides
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( limit ) : General good health exist comorbidities Body mass index ( BMI ) less 35 kg/mÂ² Borderline high high fast serum triglyceride Clinically normal finding hematology , clinical chemistry , urinalysis Be willing maintain dietary habit physical activity level throughout trial period ( next 4 month ) Have low habitual consumption fatty fish seafood , define frequency twice per month le Exclusion Criteria ( limit ) : Familial hypercholesterolemia severely high total cholesterol level History presence significant cardiovascular disease comorbidities Known allergy crustacean ( shellfish ) Bleeding disorder Disturbed absorption due change gastrointestinal tract Participation clinical trial investigational product within 30 day screen Present recent use ( within 3 month screen first screen visit , applicable ) medication know lipid modifying agent dietary supplement affect level blood cholesterol triglycerides Current recent diet , opinion Investigator , deviate normal diet ( e.g. , vegetarian may acceptable , vegan acceptable ) Female patient pregnant nursing female childbearing potential method birth control acceptable Investigator treatment Patients know coagulopathy receive anticoagulant therapy comorbidity would interfere study result Frequency fatty fish and/or seafood consumption great twice per month Present recent use longchain omega3 fatty acid supplement Perimenopausal woman postmenopausal woman take hormone replacement therapy Patients test positive human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) hepatitis B C Systolic blood pressure great 159 mmHg diastolic blood pressure great 99 mmHg use antihypertensive medication Diabetic subject Staff Cetero Research
